channel.title: Changing home
channel.description: Hey everyone, I have played rs for along time and just got into rsps's and decided to learn coding. I downloaded a source and client and have been messing around, so I know how to make shops, edit npc's and their drops. And various other things but for some reason cant figure out how to change the home location. I know this may seem pathetic to you that I cant figure this out but I will appreciate any help possible. (side note, I plan on putting home in Rimmington since I think it would be unique to the server and haven't seen any servers with home there. Feel free to use this location if you wish I dont mind. Just got the server to learn to code not release.)

item.title: Changing home
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

It should be in the clickingbuttons class (clickingbuttons.java) search the coordinates.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing home
item.dc:creator: @xElite xElite
item.description:
@xElite wrote:

Find the teleport coords on the files and change the x and y to what you want.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing home
item.dc:creator: @alltimenewb alltimenewb
item.description:
@alltimenewb wrote:

Delta

Edit: Okay well I changed it so when I type ::home it sends me to where I want the new home to be however if I click the home button in the magic tab it sends me to old home still. I’m gonna mess around with it but if anyone one can help me quicker it would be appreciated.

Read full topic
